EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Information (1333136956.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Information (1333136956.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Jolly, Welcome back to MBO! My name is Sara Conde and I am helping Nicolette while she is out of the office. Please follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the “Enrollment” link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. ------------------------------------------- From: Jolly Khanna[SMTP:JOLLYKH@YAHOO.COM] <mailto:[SMTP:JOLLYKH@YAHOO.COM]> Sent: Friday, March 30, 2012 1:38:25 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Information Auto forwarded by a Rule Hi Nicolette, I just got back from vacation and was going to fill out the documents you asked me to fill out but can’t find them anywhere. There was one in particular where you said I need to get notarized. Can you help me find this document? From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Monday, March 19, 2012 1:05 PM To: Jolly Khanna Subject: MBO Partners Information Hi Jolly, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources as promised for your review: - We have created an index of past webinars on topics specifically catered for independent consultants. You can view our index by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5VuV5949yAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- In addition we have a 2012 Webinar track that will cover everything to do with working independently. We have three tracks, you can sign up to receive notifications when new webinars are scheduled by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/Webinar.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5VuV5949yAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5VuV5949yAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. If you have questions, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. I look forward to working with you! Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV5VuV5949yAI6HikHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
